type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.java.JavaRuntime
type.description:
Represents a Java virtual machine installation.
(since 2.11)

method.name: getJavaHome
method.description:
The home directory of the Java runtime installation.

returns:The home directory. Never returns null.

method.name: getJavaVersion
method.description:
The Java version of the Java runtime installation.

returns:The Java version. Never returns null.

property.name: javaHome
property.description:
The home directory of the Java runtime installation.

returns:The home directory. Never returns null.

property.name: javaVersion
property.description:
The Java version of the Java runtime installation.

returns:The Java version. Never returns null.
